'''Platforms Supported:''' i386, PowerPC, AMD64, IA64

'''Fluxbuntu Editions:''' Desktop, Educational, Server

'''Reality:''' Fluxbuntu is a LPAE-standard compliant, Ubuntu-based derivative. It is lightweight, swift and efficient. These features support the Fluxbuntu Linux Project's Goal of running on a wide range of mobile devices and computers (low-end & high-end).

'''Result:''' Ubuntu being able to run on a exceedingly larger range of computers and devices, thus being utilized by more people.
